head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FRASER, BERT H.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FRASER, BERT H.

block.p: FRASER-Bert H. Died Nov. 3, age 58 in New York. Actor, comedian, singer, dancer, raconteur, boon companion, loyal pal. Dear Bertie, farewell from all your friends at the Amateur Comedy Club and the Snarks, who loved you and will remember you always. Memorial Celebration at 2PM Sunday at the ACC Clubhouse, 150 E. 36 Street.
